pages.text: Long ago, a mysterious civilization harnessed the gravity-defying properties of Gravitite to invent wondrous aircraft. $(br2)These pioneers used floating crystals to build airships and gliders, soaring across the Aether's sky-high islands.

Their cities floated among the clouds, with intricate architecture and advanced technology that have since vanished. $(br2)Explore the ruins scattered across the islands, uncover relics, and piece together the secrets of these skyfarers.
The Aether is a stunning, sky-high dimension filled with floating islands and mystical creatures. $(br2)Build a glowstone portal, light it with water, and get ready for adventure!

Explore dungeons, challenge Guardians, and find Gravitite Ore, an enchanted material that defies gravity! $(br2)Tame and ride Moas, or marvel at the majestic Zephyrs and Aerwhales. $(br2)There's so much more to uncover in The Aether, so grab your gear and let your journey begin!
